text: Waqaee kharabi mein parr gaye woh log jinhon ney apni aulad ko mehaz barah-e-himaqat bila kiss sanad kay qatal ker dala aur jo cheez inn ko Allah ney khaney peeney ko di thin unn ko haram ker liya mehaz Allah per iftra bandhney kay tor per. Be-shak yeh log gumrahi mein parr gaye aur kabhi raah-e-raast per chalney walay nahi huye
